00028 CNExperiment::CNExperiment()
00029 {
00030   m_iIndex = 0;
00031   m_iInstanceCount++;
00032   m_eCNCallGender = affx::UnknownGender;
00033   m_eRawIntensityRatioGender = affx::UnknownGender;
00034   m_fCNCallGenderRatio = 0;
00035   m_fRawIntensityRatio = 0;
00036   m_bXX = false;
00037   m_bY = false;
00038   m_bCNCallGenderComputed = false;
00039   m_fXXRatio = 0;
00040   m_fYRatio = 0;
00041   m_fMedianAutosomeMedian = 0;
00042   m_fMadDiffCN = 0;
00043   m_fIqr = 0;
00044   m_fMeanAbsRle = 0;
00045   m_fGCCorrectionMetric = 0;
00046   m_fChrXMean = 0;
00047   m_fChrYMean = 0;
00048   m_fMedianCnState = 0;
00049   m_fHomFrequency = 0;
00050   m_fHetFrequency = 0;
00051   m_dPError=0.0;
00052   m_fCNCallGenderConfidence = 0;
00053   m_fMedianRawIntensity = 0;
00054   m_fCallRate = 0.0;
00055   m_fSNPQC = 0;
00056   m_fRawSNPQC = 0.0;
00057   m_bSNPQCset = false;
00058   m_fAntigenomicRatio = 0;
00059   m_fGenomeLOH = 0;
00060   m_fAutosomeGenomeLOH = 0;
00061   m_iNumberOfChromosomes = 0;
00062   m_iWavinessSegCountLoss = 0;
00063   m_iWavinessSegCountGain = 0;
00064   m_fWavinessSd = 0;
00065   m_iNumberOfWavesUsed = -1;
00066   m_iCNCallGenderNotZero = 0;
00067   m_iCNCallGenderYCount = 0;
00068   m_fL2Gradient = 0.0;
00069 }

00071 /**
00072  * @brief Destructor
00073  */
00074 CNExperiment::~CNExperiment()
00075 {
00076   m_arQCMetricColumnValues.deleteAll();
00077   m_iInstanceCount--;
00078   if (m_iInstanceCount == 0) {
00079     m_arQCMetricColumnNames.deleteAll();
00080   }
00081 
00082 }

00270 // m_dPError is a value set on the command line for the CNAnalysisMethodLOH module.  It is also needed in the
00271 // CNAnalysisMethodSetment in order to compute confidences.  Rather than have this value set on the commmand line
00272 // for this latter module we pass it to the experiment object and access it when segmenting.
00273 double CNExperiment::getPError()
00274 {
00275     return m_dPError;
00276 }
00277 void CNExperiment::setPError( double d)
00278 {
00279    m_dPError = d;

00353 int CNExperiment::getWavinessSegCountTotal()
00354 {
00355   if (m_iWavinessSegCountGain == -1 && m_iWavinessSegCountLoss == -1) {
00356     return -1;
00357   }
00358   return m_iWavinessSegCountGain + m_iWavinessSegCountLoss;
00359 }

00433 /**
00434  * @brief Compare function.
00435  * @param that - A reference to an instance of this class.
00436  * @param iCompareCode - The code to switch on when doing compares. (Each code is a different compare.)
00437  * @return - int value. (-1 if *this < that, 0 if *this == that, 1 if *this > that)
00438  */
00439 int CNExperiment::compareTo(CNExperiment& that, int iCompareCode)
00440 {
00441   int iCompareResult = 0;
00442   switch (iCompareCode) {
00443   case 0:
00444     iCompareResult = m_strExperimentName.compareTo(that.m_strExperimentName, 0);
00445     break;
00446   }
00447   return iCompareResult;
00448 }

00450 /**
00451  * @brief Set the gender for the sample using the affx gender code
00452  * @param affx::Gender - The affx gender code
00453  */
00454 void CNExperiment::setCNCallGender(affx::Gender eGender)
00455 {
00456   m_eCNCallGender = eGender;
00457 }
00458 void CNExperiment::setCNCallGenderFromString(const AffxString& strIn)
00459 {
00460   AffxString str = strIn;
00461   AffxString strTemp = str.toLowerCase();
00462   if (strTemp == "male") {
00463     setCNCallGender(affx::Male);
00464   } else if (strTemp == "female") {
00465     setCNCallGender(affx::Female);
00466   } else {
00467     setCNCallGender(affx::UnknownGender);
00468   }
00469 }
00470 void CNExperiment::setRawIntensityRatioGender(affx::Gender eGender)
00471 {
00472   m_eRawIntensityRatioGender = eGender;
00473 }
00474 
00475 /**
00476  * @brief Set the gender for the sample using a string 'male' or 'female'
00477  * @param AffxString& - The gender string
00478  */
00479 void CNExperiment::setRawIntensityRatioGenderFromString(const AffxString& strIn)
00480 {
00481   AffxString str = strIn;
00482   AffxString strTemp = str.toLowerCase();
00483   if (strTemp == "male") {
00484     setRawIntensityRatioGender(affx::Male);
00485   } else if (strTemp == "female") {
00486     setRawIntensityRatioGender(affx::Female);
00487   } else {
00488     setRawIntensityRatioGender(affx::UnknownGender);
00489   }
00490 }

00512 CNExperimentArray::CNExperimentArray() {}

00514 CNExperimentArray::~CNExperimentArray()
00515 {
00516   deleteAll();
00517 }
00518 
00519 // This method was deliberately kept out of the CNExperiment class so as not
00520 // to change the copy sematics of the class.
00521 void CNExperimentArray::copyExperiments(CNExperimentArray& from, CNExperimentArray& to)
00522 {
00523     to.reserve(from.size());
00524     for (int iexp = 0; iexp < from.getCount(); ++iexp) {
00525         CNExperiment* pexp = new CNExperiment();
00526         *pexp = *from.getAt(iexp);
00527 
00528         // deep copy vector of pointers (AffxArray<AffxString>)
00529         pexp->getQCMetricColumnValues()->resize(0);
00530         for (int istr = 0; istr < from.getAt(iexp)->getQCMetricColumnValues()->getCount(); ++istr) {
00531             pexp->getQCMetricColumnValues()->add(new AffxString(*from.getAt(iexp)->getQCMetricColumnValues()->getAt(istr)));
00532         }
00533         to.push_back(pexp);
00534     }
00535 }
